channel.title: Dodian/Devolution pking, huge drop delay & Attack Emotes
channel.description:
Well in devolution when you pk you can kill them and get their stuff but there is about a 15 second wait before it falls to the floor. Anybody know the fix ?
And the attack emotes, I've added in every possible part for the dds to do the attack emote 403. WeaponHandler.CFG, Client.Java. Is there something i must do ?
